name: spec-up-package-changer
description: Tool for changing the package.json so it works with spec-up-t as an installed npm package.

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "console.log('Thank you for installing spec-up-splitter.

To use this tool, run: "npx spec-up-splitter"

For help run: "npx spec-up-splitter help"')"

author: Kor Dwarshuis <kor@dwarshuis.com>
